article_title: Americans (Still) Unprepared For Care Needs In Old Age

article_metadata.description: Americans 40 or older know they’ll need some personal care as they age and worry about losing their independence or having to rely on others. Yet, they are more likely to plan for their funerals than for their care needs, have no idea what such care costs, and more than [...]
article_metadata.author: Howard Gleckman
